title: Screenshot Settings?
content: Is there a section for changing the screenshot settings? It's extremely inconvenient having to hold both power and volume down, or going to recent apps to take one. I just want the old power settings menu back, (Power off, restart, screenshot, and emergency all to the right side), and the five "recent" app icons when looking at currently open apps. I have checked the settings for anything related to this, but have had no success.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
